com.etouch.taf.webui.selenium.webelement

Class Element

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.etouch.taf.webui.selenium.webelement.Element
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, CheckBox, Image, Link, Password, RadioButton, SelectBox, Text, TextBox, Video

    public abstract class Element
extends Object
    PageElement that all PageObjectType should extend. This class wraps around the WebElement
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    eTouch Systems Corporation
